posts.postText:
Anyone have a pair?

I've seen them on the ads on this forum and on my favorite commentator, PBAT, i want to know if they work.

TmarTn said they work great. But for 80 dollars for one of the cheaper ones? No thanks.

Also, my eyes never hurt if I look at my computer/TV too long, so I'm not sure how much they would work.
